flawed_nl_solution:
He shoots 200*4=<<200*4=8000>>8000 shots per week
He can recover 8000*0.2=<<8000*0.2=1600>>1600 of those arrows
So he uses 8000-1600=<<8000-1600=6400>>6400 arrows a week
The cost for those arrows would come out to 6400*5.5=$<<6400*5.5=35200>>35200 per week
His team pays for 35200*0.7=$<<35200*0.7=24640>>24640 of that
So he has to pay 35200-24640=$<<35200-24640=10560>>10560 per week for arrows
#### 10560

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 800, not 8000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
